All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
BaseJsonTransformer
An abstract class for transforming json in multiple ways.
JsonKeyRemover
Get a JSON structure without specific keys to simplify the structure.
JsonKeyRetainer
Get a JSON-formatted structure with only certain keys to simplify the structure.
JsonMinifier
Get a minified JSON structure from JSON full format to reduce data size.
JSONToolApplication
 
JSONToolController
Handle http requests for json transformations and the comparison of two json files.
JsonTransormationsWrapper
Create a json decorator based on a list of parameters.
JsonUnminifier
Get the full structure in JSON format from minified JSON format to improve the readability of the data.
TextComparator
Class designed to compare two texts and show lines where there is a difference.
TextFinder
Class designed to find all lines in the text that contain a specified string.
